languages.text: "Голосочки шепчут, что впереди ждет заварушка. Но если не умерить пыл — можно и без штанов остаться. Серьезно... без штанов?"

"The little voices are whispering that there's trouble waiting up ahead. And if you don't take things down a notch, you could be caught with your trousers down. Figuratively or literally, I'm not sure."
languages.original_text: "Голосочки шепчут, что впереди ждет заварушка. Но если не умерить пыл — можно и без штанов остаться. Серьезно... без штанов?"

traits.locale_text: "The little voices are whispering that there's trouble waiting up ahead. And if you don't take things down a notch, you could be caught with your trousers down. Figuratively or literally, I'm not sure."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The little voices are whispering that there's trouble waiting up ahead. And if you don't take things down a notch, you could be caught with your trousers down. Figuratively or literally, I'm not sure."

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “细微的声音在窃窃私语，前方有麻烦在等待着你。如果你无法保持低调、冷静行事，最后可能会落得连裤子都不剩的下场。我不确定这句话只是个比喻，还是指字面上的意思。”
languages.original_text: "The little voices are whispering that there's trouble waiting up ahead. And if you don't take things down a notch, you could be caught with your trousers down. Figuratively or literally, I'm not sure."

traits.locale_text: “细微的声音在窃窃私语，前方有麻烦在等待着你。如果你无法保持低调、冷静行事，最后可能会落得连裤子都不剩的下场。我不确定这句话只是个比喻，还是指字面上的意思。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Las voces susurran que nos esperan problemas más adelante. Y, si no se toma las cosas con más calma, puede que le pillen con los pantalones bajados. Figurada o literalmente; no lo tengo claro».
languages.original_text: "The little voices are whispering that there's trouble waiting up ahead. And if you don't take things down a notch, you could be caught with your trousers down. Figuratively or literally, I'm not sure."

traits.locale_text: «Las voces susurran que nos esperan problemas más adelante. Y, si no se toma las cosas con más calma, puede que le pillen con los pantalones bajados. Figurada o literalmente; no lo tengo claro».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「小さな声がささやいている。この先にはトラブルが待っている、と。そして、もしあなたが物事を一段落させなければ、あなたは尻に火が点いた状態で捕まるかもしれない、と。比喩的なのか、言葉通りの意味なのか、よくわからないけれど」
languages.original_text: "The little voices are whispering that there's trouble waiting up ahead. And if you don't take things down a notch, you could be caught with your trousers down. Figuratively or literally, I'm not sure."

traits.locale_text: 「小さな声がささやいている。この先にはトラブルが待っている、と。そして、もしあなたが物事を一段落させなければ、あなたはズボンを下ろした状態で捕まるかもしれない、と。比喩的なのか、言葉通りの意味なのか、よくわからないけれど」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Die leisen Stimmen flüstern mir, dass uns Ärger erwartet. Und wenn Ihr nicht aufpasst, könntet Ihr mit heruntergelassener Hose erwischt werden. Bildlich oder buchstäblich. Da bin ich mir nicht sicher."
languages.original_text: "The little voices are whispering that there's trouble waiting up ahead. And if you don't take things down a notch, you could be caught with your trousers down. Figuratively or literally, I'm not sure."

traits.locale_text: "Die leisen Stimmen flüstern mir, dass uns Ärger erwartet. Und wenn Ihr nicht aufpasst, könntet Ihr mit heruntergelassener Hose erwischt werden. Bildlich oder buchstäblich. Da bin ich mir nicht sicher."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Les petites voix s'agitent. Elles parlent des dangers qui nous guettent. Si vous ne faites pas preuve de retenue, vous risquez de vous retrouver à nu. Au sens propre ou au figuré, je l'ignore. »
languages.original_text: "The little voices are whispering that there's trouble waiting up ahead. And if you don't take things down a notch, you could be caught with your trousers down. Figuratively or literally, I'm not sure."

traits.locale_text: « Les petites voix s'agitent. Elles parlent des dangers qui nous guettent. Si vous ne faites pas preuve de retenue, vous risquez de vous retrouver à nu. Au sens propre ou au figuré, je l'ignore. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Küçük sesler ileride başımızın derde gireceğini söylüyor ve eğer ağırdan alıp temkinli yaklaşmazsan donsuz yakalanabilirsin. Benzetme mi yoksa gerçek anlamda mı, orasını bilmem."
languages.original_text: "The little voices are whispering that there's trouble waiting up ahead. And if you don't take things down a notch, you could be caught with your trousers down. Figuratively or literally, I'm not sure."
